tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Went to Dr Rajesh for a tooth emergency.  He took a temporary measure and promptly provided me a date for further checkup. The tooth went for a root canal, and he guided me through the whole process, patiently answering my questions. 
Thanks you sir for such a well guided treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I had been searching for a good implant doctor for a long time, going through several consultations i was looking to find the best one. Through some research, I found Dr. Rajesh and scheduled one more consultation. The clinic was exceptionally clean and hygienic. Dr. Rajesh thoroughly explained the procedure, something I hadn't experienced in other consultations.

Although the cost seemed a bit higher compared to others, I chose to proceed because I wanted the expertise and assurance of quality and longevity. The process began with a root implant, which required a 7-8 month wait for the roots to integrate. After this period, we decided to fix the crown. There was regular follow-ups to check the fit, and faced some complications due to teeth alignment.

A trial session was done to ensured my comfort, and after making some adjustments, we finalised the implant. The implant was successfully placed, and I couldn't be happier with the results. The shape and size are exactly what I wanted. Though there are some initial discomfort, Dr. Rajesh  addressed my concerns and scheduled a follow-up.

What I really appreciate about Dr. Rajesh is his straight forward attitude and commitment to perfection. I would highly recommend him and would like to thank him for his care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I recently visited Dr. Rajesh for a root canal procedure. Initially, I was very anxious since I had never undergone this treatment before. However, Dr. Rajesh was incredibly patient and reassuring throughout the entire process. He took the time to explain each step, ensuring I felt comfortable and calm. His professionalism and gentle approach made the experience much less daunting. I am very satisfied with the outcome of the treatment and highly recommend Dr. Rajesh for his excellent care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am aged 47 and was diagnosed with Periodontal disease 5-6 years back.  I was quite hesitant to undergo the complete treatment thinking about the painful process (opening gums and cleaning entire teeth) and also possible loss of weak teeth. I was only doing the peripheral cleaning once in a while which didn’t help the purpose. With the advice from my wife, one consultation with Dr. Rajesh at Fresh Breath Dental Clinic has changed my perception about the treatment. He explained me the amount of damage that I’m doing to my teeth and to the teeth bone by delaying the treatment. With lots of patience he explained me the while process, clearing all my doubts which gave me lot of confidence to prepare myself for the surgery removing my misconceptions and inhibitions.  

He planned the procedures in such a way that I get ample recovery time, live with regular routine and more importantly made it less painful experience. The overall procedure was done over a period of 6 weeks with one sitting each week. With hard tarter and bacteria never seen before, each sitting has tested the patience of Dr and also my cooperation. His attention to detail procedures and perfection not only helped me in getting rid of the bacteria and tartar that I accumulated though this disease but also retained my teeth.  

There are no words to describe how WONDERFUL my experience with Dr Rajesh at Fresh Breath Dental Clinic. To simply put, he gave rebirth for my teeth. Thanks a lot Dr. for the treatment and making my life better.
reply_text:
I am glad Mr. Srinivas that your experience was a pleasurable one. I can understand that you were very scared and sceptical about the gum surgery procedure untill you really got to know how this gum disease/periodontitis can impact ur teeth supporting bone and ur basic lifestyle and understood the importance of saving and preserving your natural teeth to eat comfortably. 
Keep maintaining good oral hygiene practices and follow ups for a healthier and happier smile. 
Take care
Cheers😊

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: I had itching around my crown.. I had visited many doctors but not much help. But Rajesh Dr helped me resolve the issue. He is firm in his treatment. I needed a doctor who guides me properly and I'm happy
Doctor came across as very friendly and polite, and made me comfortable, was thorough in his examination of my oral condition and explained the way forward and reasons for doing so. Recommend!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Endo Surgery Or Apicoectomy,Dental Fillings,Periodontal Flap Surgery,Implant Rehabilitation,
review: I visited Dr an year back for a childhood dental trauma which turned into an infection.I was facing the problem since quite a few years but couldn’t gather a courage to trust any doctor because I was very scared to undergo any kind of painful surgery thanks to all the YouTube videos and other doctors who made it to be a big deal when I visited doctor I got very positive vibes and he explained the process in such a simple way that I trusted him with the closed eyes.He ensured me that it would be a painless procedure and I will get rid of my problem forever.It was of around 3 rounds of surgery including the clearing of inflection from gums after the infected tooth extraction and the implant and trust me the doctor truly kept his words.I am very happy with the outcome and the doctor as well who holds such an expertise and brilliance at his work that he turns even the complicated cases into the simpler ones with his positivity and to the point line of treatment.My suggestion to whoever is reading my comment is please trust his words because he will always keep his patients beyond anything.Thank you so much doctor for such a pleasant experience ,you have way to go :)

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
I visited the Fresh Breath Dental clinic for my mother Nalini’s treatment, she had multiple medical complications, so were worried about the procedure she needs to go through, Dr Rajesh was kind enough to explain in detail the need for the procedure, how it is performed and what precautions need to be taken after the procedure. He is a friendly and caring professional. My mother underwent the dental implant without problems. We recommend Fresh Breath clinic as the place for everyone in need of any dental procedure. 

Thank you, Dr Rajesh.
reply_text:
Thanks Veena😊.. Am pleased to know that Nalini had a pleasant experience@ fresh breath dental clinic.. 
Her treatment outcome is shaping up well. She is also calm and composed during the procedures now😊 and ready to finish with final full mouth prosthetic restoration in few months from now.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I cannot express enough how grateful my family and I are for the incredible care we received from Dr. Rajesh Naik. My mother was suffering from severe pain in her upper teeth and swelling, and our initial visit to another hospital left her in distress with the possibility of tooth extraction.

Thankfully, we decided to seek a second opinion from Dr. Rajesh Naik, and it was a game-changer. Dr. Naik quickly identified the root cause of my mother's dental problem, which stemmed from an injury that occurred nine years ago. This injury had led to the formation of an infection in her upper teeth.

Dr. Naik's diagnosis was clear: my mom needed surgery and a root canal. Understandably, my mother was apprehensive about the pain and the procedure itself. However, Dr. Naik's expertise and gentle approach put her at ease.

The surgery went smoother than we could have ever hoped for. Dr. Naik's skill and precision minimized any discomfort, and the pain was far less than expected.

Our experience with Dr. Rajesh Naik was nothing short of exceptional. His professionalism, compassion, and dedication to his patients are truly commendable. He not only saved my mother's teeth but also her peace of mind.

I highly recommend Dr. Rajesh Naik to anyone seeking top-notch dental care. Thank you, Dr. Naik, for your outstanding expertise and for making a challenging situation manageable. You've made a lasting positive impact on our lives, and we are truly grateful.
reply_text:
Thanks Sandhya.. I still remember the first day your mom visited my facility and she was scared and petrified and totally clueless about the procedure ..
Well am glad that myself and my team were able to  give her the best possible treatment experience and made sure her surgery process went very smoothly and she was very comfortable during entire course of treatment.
Take care.
Cheers😊

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have a 10 month old baby and visited doctor on a Sunday with extreme tooth pain. Doctor was so considerate that he exceptionally started the treatment right away as I wouldn’t have been able to manage the pain and baby. He explained that the emergency procedure would be painful however he talked me through it and made me quite comfortable. Continuous follow ups by the doctor on how we are doing and about the pain is amazing. Lovely ambience and well maintained clinic. More than the patient, The doctor aims at relieving the pain of the patient!!

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review:
I have had many previous bad experiences of shoddy tooth jobs done by dentists in the past. But after having met Dr. Rajesh all of my dental phobias have left for good.
It has been an absolute pleasure to consult with Dr. Rajesh simply because his expertise speaks for itself. From his accurate diagnosis of the issue, recommendations to seamless procedures he is undoubtedly the finest doctors I have come across. 
We often think of cost as an important criteria but given the quality of his treatment I understand its true value and actually gives right perspective about dental health.
He will always be the "GO-TO" person for all dental care requirements of my family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
This is my very first dentist experience, please do read it.
 Dr. Rajesh Naik is a wonderful doctor. I was nervous about my first visit to a dentist. He did not judge my oral routine on seeing my tooth cavities and tartar. Instead, he helped me ease my worries.

I went for a root canal. It was affordable, the process was painless, and the background ambiance music is soothing to relieve your nervousness.

I would recommend Dr. Rajesh Naik and Fresh Breath Dental Clinic to anyone who wants a good affordable doctor who does not judge based on your oral health.

I found my permanent dentist for a visit, I aim to visit this clinic once every 6 months!.
reply_text:
Hey Mahesh...its wonderful to know from you that your first ever visit to a Dentist in your life was a pleasurable one😊.
Good to know that you are also very well informed now about the dental hygiene and the importance of follow up visits every 6months,thats awesome. 
Take care Mahesh.
Cheers😊

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Rajesh is the first dentist I have ever visited in my life . I had a wide gap between my front two teeth and throughout my whole life I had been very conscious to smile or talk to someone. But Dr Naik worked his magic and gave me a ceramic filling and it looks so natural and beautiful that I have not stopped smiling ever since . He is extremely patient and knowledgeable. He goes out of his way to explain in detail and that in turn gives you more confidence in him . I will be definitely visiting him for my cavity fillings as well. Highly recommended for everyone.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,

I really impressed for these qualities. As he guessed, beside  🦷s  also damaged badly, and taken more time for the treatment. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Rajesh is a fantastic doctor. I was suffering from toothache for a long time and was worried about seeing a doctor in the current covid scenario. But I’m so glad I went to see him. He is a thorough professional and a friendly doctor at the same time. He patiently explained to me the entire procedure and put me at ease immediately. Even during the procedure he kept checking on me and ensured the least amount of discomfort. Post the procedure he clearly explained the next steps and the care to be taken. I feel so much better post the RCT. His clinic is impeccably maintained and you feel very safe. I highly recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Few weeks back, I had a tooth problem and visited Dr Rajesh. Had an honest conversation with doctor and after examining thouroughly he suggested for RCT. 
Initially, was a bit worried for several visits during the pandemic! Howecer, Dr Rajesh made me very comfortable and assured the best level of treatment and safety during the process.
Just with a few visits, the procedure was over and got a brand new tooth :)
I must say that Dr Rajesh is an excellent doctor who really cares about the patients.
The clinic is also very hygienic and well-maintained.  There is no walk ins to protect maximum safety during the pandemic and visits are based on prior aoppintments.
Really had a great experience!

It has been an absolute pleasure to consult with Dr. Rajesh for the last year or so.  Firstly, he runs a very hygienic clinic, is very friendly and receptive towards his patients and his professional expertise is plain to see. Appointment booking is very streamlined and Dr. Rajesh's availability and professionalism ensures that I hardly need to wait when I walk in for my regular appointments.

I've been undergoing treatment with Invisalign for the past year or so, and I'm very pleased with the results yielded so far, and will continue to consult with Dr. Rajesh for all my dental needs in the future. Highly recommended !

context: Dental Fillings,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Pulpectomy,Dental Crowns,
review: We approached the doctor after visiting a couple of paediatric dental chains for my 4 yo son in Bangalore. We were able to strike a chord with Dr. Rajesh from the very first sitting onwards, where he explained us the minimalist approach for a toddler conscious that most of his affected tooth (temporary) would fall off in a matter of few years. Dr. Rajesh took considerable time in explaining us the approach and reasoning behind each of the proposed procedures for 5 of my son's tooth. What has worked really well for us is the doctor's friendliness and approachability both of which had played a vital role in my 4 yo son getting accquainted with the doctor and atmosphere. Thanks to which, we were able to complete procedures on 5 of my son's tooth (including rct and crowning) in a matter of 3 weeks in 3 sittings. We are indeed greatful to Dr. Rajesh for steering us in the right direction. I am sure that we would have spent considerable amount to fix all my son's dental issues had we not met Dr. Rajesh

review: ********* ******* Sees the problem and diagnosis with ease and accuracy. You're in safe hands always with Dr. Rajesh
Consultation charges are INR 700. Scaling charges are INR 3500. Too much expensive.  Satisfaction is far from reach.
reply_text:
The feedback from you is very contradictory as the consultant charges are displayed when you do booking on Practo😊.

The patient never underwent any procedure and the charges mentioned is wrong. 

At fresh breath dental  following protocols are take   followed during the first consultation visit:

1.No procedure will be done during first patient visit to clinic except any kind of emergency. 

2.Premedications and necessary test or investigations will be prescribed to alleviate the patient pain. 

3..The patient will be promptly attended on the given time. 

4. Solution to dental problem is clearly explained in detail. 
The patients are made aware of treatment plan and estimated cost .Consent is totally a patients prerogative. 
If patient is willing to go ahead then a convenient appointment time is scheduled. 

5.The word termed"expensive" can be considered relative and always has a choice before they decide to go ahead. 

Thank you. 
Team Fresh Breath Dental.
